help.config: Use this configuration node to set the credentials to access your coreBOS installation.
help.login: Execute the login process to coreBOS and return the session information in the payload
help.logout: Execute the logout process from coreBOS
help.describe: Get all the details of fields and metadata of a module
help.listtypes: Get a list of available modules
help.update: Update a record with the values present in `msg.record` and the module `msg.module`. Must contain the record ID
help.create: Insert a record with the values present in `msg.record` and the module `msg.module`
